title: NOPD investigating fatal Algiers shooting
content:
There was a fatal shooting of a man in the 2100 block of Springbrook Lane in Algiers late Wednesday afternoon (March 30), New Orleans police reported.
The shooting occurred at the Stoney Brook Apartments and police arrived at 4:56 p.m. to find the body of a man inside an apartment. He had a gunshot wound to the body, police said.
A woman at the scene said the person who lives in the apartment where police had converged works as a security guard. "He always kept to himself," she said. "Would just go to work and come home."
New Orleans police were investigating a fatal shooting Tuesday evening in the 7500 block of Kingsport Boulevard.
Stay with NOLA.com | The Times Picayune as more information becomes available on this breaking story.
